transcript:
Andrew coldly, but he thought: "I am going to save the army." 
"My dear fellow, you are a hero!" said Bili- bin. 
THAT SAME NIGHT, having taken leave of the Minister of War, Bolkonski set off to rejoin the army, not knowing where he would find it and fearing to be-'captured by the French on the way to Krems. 
In Briinn everybody attached to the court was packing up, and the heavy baggage was al- ready being dispatched to Olmutz. Near Het- zelsdorf Prince Andrew struck the highroad along whi
